summary: Complete testing of P2 Modules (Vaste Activa, Kostenplaatsen, Wisselkoersen) - Backend: 38/38 tests passed, Frontend: All navigation and CRUD dialogs working correctly

minor.issue: BASE_URL was empty due to missing env var - fixed by adding default URL

critical_code_review_comments: All P2 module sidebar links are correctly configured in Layout.js
Vaste Activa page shows correct statistics (15 activa, SRD 590,000 aanschafwaarde, SRD 584,245.82 boekwaarde)
Kostenplaatsen page displays cards with budget tracking and progress bars
Wisselkoersen page shows EUR (39.00 SRD) and USD (36.50 SRD) with Converter and Nieuwe Koers buttons
Wisselkoersen Converter correctly calculates: 100 USD = SRD 3,650 (koers 36.5)
All CRUD dialogs open correctly with proper form fields
Backend APIs all return correct data and handle authentication properly
seed_data_creation: Test data from previous iterations preserved
context_for_next_testing_agent: P2 modules fully tested and working. All sidebar links visible under Boekhouding section. Key routes: /app/boekhouding/activa, /app/boekhouding/kostenplaatsen, /app/boekhouding/wisselkoersen. Converter functionality tested and working correctly.

backend_api.authentication: PASS - All endpoints require auth (401/403 for unauthenticated)

frontend_navigation.sidebar_links: PASS - All 3 P2 module links visible in Boekhouding section

frontend_crud_dialogs.nieuw_activum_dialog: PASS - Opens with all form fields
frontend_crud_dialogs.nieuwe_kostenplaats_dialog: PASS - Opens with all form fields
frontend_crud_dialogs.nieuwe_koers_dialog: PASS - Opens with Valuta, Koers, Datum, Bron fields
frontend_crud_dialogs.converter_dialog: PASS - Opens and calculates correctly (100 USD = SRD 3,650)
